text: Lee McKenzie (born 1 December 1977 in Ayr, Scotland) is a sports television reporter who currently reports from the pit lane in the BBCs coverage of Formula 1 races. She has also presented on Sky Sports. McKenzie is the daughter of Bob McKenzie, a fellow sport and motorsport journalist. She has been a reporter since she was 15. Lee has worked mostly in motorsport and rugby. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish journalists Category:People from Ayr
title: Lee McKenzie
